settings.popup_text: Entice customers to sign up for your mailing list with discounts or exclusive offers. Include an image for extra impact.

settings.testimonial: The team were uber helpful with my request. They were very responsive when I had questions about the process. Now my site is performing 100% better. Thanks!
settings.author: Sawdust & Embers

settings.testimonial: The app is fantastic, especially if you are a novice and beginner. It is very intuitive and easy to use. The recommendations are invaluable. Highly recommend especially if you have an online shop.
settings.author: Theory of Many

settings.testimonial:
Wish I had found this earlier! Get this app. It's really worth it and much needed. 
Would definitely recommend!
settings.author: The Cuteness Shop

settings.testimonial: I had such a great experience with this. Quick, professional, and exactly as required. Highly recommended. Thank you.
settings.author: Temple Cycles

settings.testimonial: I'm really enjoying this app so far. You get a lot of value in their paid package and the daily introduction videos via email help a ton. I asked their customer service a question and got a prompt and helpful response within 24hrs. I'm very happy with this app!
settings.author: Faith Paper Shop

settings.testimonial: Great customer service. Quick and speedy. Excited to continue to use the app. Good onboarding process.
settings.author: Made in Cookware

settings.testimonial: This is a great app. It is easy to use. I had no problem setting it up. Would recommend it to anyone.
settings.author: Wonderful Buy Store

settings.testimonial: Great App! This is the second store I've used their service and would highly recommend. The out of the box free features are a great starting point for any new online shop. You'll feel better about the back end of your site with their frequent checks and email updates.
settings.author: Blockchain Shop

settings.testimonial: This is a very helpful tool and the support team is superb. I would definitely recommend this app to a friend.
settings.author: Phone Holder Gadgets
